column1: Description

Clean lines and a rhinestone brooch add a charming touch to this three-piece skirt suit by Giovanna Signature. This set includes a collarless jacket with a rhinestone closure, a matching cami, and a modest column skirt. This suit is also machine washable for easy care.

Click here to view the Giovanna Signature Collection's sizing guide

  • Color options: Fuchsia, black, royal, silver, and white
  • Fit: Missy
  • Print: Solid
  • Camisole sleeves: Sleeveless
  • Jacket sleeves: Long
  • Waist details: Side elastic waistband
  • Neckline: Round neckline
  • Lining: Fully lined
  • Skirt closure: Back zipper with button closure
  • Jacket closure: Rhinestone brooch closure
  • Jacket features: Collarless, fully lined
  • Shell materials: 100-percent polyester
  • Lining materials: 100-percent polyester
  • Machine washable
  • Model: 0650

The approximate length from the cami's top center back to the hem is 22 inches. The approximate skirt inseam is 33 inches. The approximate length from the jacket's top center back to the hem is 27.5 inches. These measurements were taken from a size 10.

Measurement Guide

All measurements are approximate and may vary by size.

This Giovanna 3-piece skirt suit is perfect for a day at the office, important meetings or an elegant dining experience. A detachable brooch lets you change the look of this fully lined women's skirt suit in an instant, and the collarless jacket and round-necked camisole create clean lines for a simply elegant style. This classic suit now comes in washable fabric, just remove the brooch, throw it into your washer and it will come out nicely!

Make a statement at the office with this Giovanna Signature women's peplum skirt suit. Show off the top half of this two-piece set, which consists of a long-sleeved jacket with an embellished shawl collar adorned with three novelty buttons for a classic and chic style, the modesty panel is included. The second piece is a back-slit, princess-seam skirt, the hem of which comes to mid-calf and flatters curves in a professional way. Toss this suit in the washing machine for easy cleaning. With no need for trips to the dry cleaner, you can be ready to take charge of your workplace at a moment's notice. The hat shown on the model is sold separately.
  • Two-piece skirt suit creates a flattering yet professional  profile
  • Available in red, white and chocolate for a variety of  possible combinations
  • 100 percent polyester and machine-washable for easy care
  • Details like novelty buttons, double peplum and embellished  shawl collar add flair to a classic suit

    • The approximate length from the center back to the hem is Skirt: 33.5 inches. The approximate length from the jacket'stop center back to the hem is 23.5 inches. These measurements were taken from a size 10.

  • Jacket sleeves: Long sleeves
  • Top sleeves: Sleeveless
  • Waist details: Side elastic band waist
  • Jacket neckline: Notch collar
  • Top neckline: Round neck
  • Lining: Fully lined
  • Skirt closure: 1 button and zipper closure
  • Jacket closure: Jeweled brooch closure
  • Shell materials: 100-percent polyester
  • Lining materials: 100-percent polyester
  • Care: Dry clean
